chapter_so_far_add: Artie finalized a 'glass cannon' build with 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie and Fizz have entered the first tutorial zone, the Whispering Woods.
key_events: Artie accidentally allocated 100 attribute points to Critical Hit Rate due to a nervous spasm.
Artie confirmed his build, resulting in his HP being capped at 1/1.
The System awarded Artie the 'Crit or Quit' title, making all hits guaranteed crits but all damage fatal.
Fizz pulled her Standard Guide's Manual from her satchel as they transitioned to the physical world.
Artie and Fizz were deployed to the Whispering Woods tutorial zone.
A low growl from the thicket signaled the presence of a nearby monster.
last_scene: Artie Penhaligon navigated the Character Creation Suite under the supervision of Fizz.

This locked his build, granting him the 'Crit or Quit' title and capping his health at a fragile 1 HP before he was deployed to the Whispering Woods.

issues.message: UI value [HP: 1/1] in prose contradicts character_continuity_system_state for CHAR_ARTIE which lists hp as {current: 0, max: 100}.

UI mechanics [Strength, Agility, Intelligence, Constitution, Luck, Critical Hit Rate] and Title [TITLE_CRIT_OR_QUIT] are depicted in authoritative surfaces but are missing from the character_continuity_system_state for CHAR_ARTIE. Provide these IDs in the continuity state to resolve.

Scene depicts milestone 'deployment_initiated' occurring ('Deployment Commencing...'), but the milestone is already marked as DONE in the state invariants. Milestone uniqueness prohibits re-depicting completed milestones.

The must_stay_true block contains mutually exclusive facts: Artie is 'currently in a non-physical void state' vs 'deployed to the Whispering Woods'; and 'HP is 0/Deceased' vs 'HP is permanently locked at 1/1'.
